description: The three highest-ranking Marine officers below the Fleet Admiral, representing the World Government's greatest military strength. The three Admirals are Aokiji, Akainu, and Kizaru.

members.joinCircumstances: Revealed as one of the three Marine Admirals

keyMoments.title: The Three Admirals Revealed
keyMoments.description: Robin reveals the existence of the three Marine Admirals - Aokiji, Akainu, and Kizaru - explaining they are the World Government's three greatest powers.
keyMoments.significance: First time all three Admirals are mentioned by name in the anime, establishing the highest tier of Marine power.

ideology: Justice (various interpretations: Lazy Justice, Absolute Justice, Unclear Justice)
